overview: Oren (24) is a transgender in the closet, feels he is a woman and not a man and hides it from all of his family and friends. Oren lives in Jaffa with his single mom. His childhood in his hometown forced him to develop a tough and sometimes scary appearance, so that he would not suffer from bullying. Oren's dream is to be accepted to the best fashion school in the country "Shenkar", and through being a fashion designer to break the gender rules and design clothes that challenge the "masculine" and "feminine" clothing accepted in society.
title: The Tailor
